questions.question: What does Rachel say to Chandler after he sees her naked?
options: You have no respect for anybody's privacy!
I'm going to call the police on you.
You're just trying to get a rise out of me.
questions.correct_answer: You have no respect for anybody's privacy!
questions.explanation: Rachel scolds Chandler for barging into her apartment and seeing her naked.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's boyfriend's profession?
questions.explanation: Phoebe refers to her boyfriend Roger as a 'shrink'.

options: Because his wife was a lesbian.

Because they did not have children.
Because they did not have enough money.
questions.correct_answer: Because his wife was a lesbian.

options: Because he is too intense and creepy.

Because he wants his dad to be happy.

options: You'll never be able to commit to someone.
